original_text: But while he was still living, he gave gifts to the sons of his concubines and sent them away from his son Isaac to the land of the east.
korean_text: 자기 서자들에게도 재산을 주어 자기 생전에 그들로 하여금 자기 아들 이삭을 떠나 동방 곧 동쪽 땅으로 가게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: But while he was still living
he gave gifts to the sons of his concubines
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 첩들의 아들들에게 선물을 주었고

sentences.original_text: and sent them away from his son Isaac
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 그의 아들 이삭에게서 보내버렸다

sentences.original_text: to the land of the east
